description:
This plugin allows you to save time mounting TrueCrypt volumes.

It can automatically select the container, drive letter and even use KeePass' autotype functionality to automatically type the password.

#### Documentation
* [Manual](https://bitbucket.org/schalpat/keepasstruecryptmount/wiki/Home)
* [API Reference](https://bitbucket.org/schalpat/keepasstruecryptmount/wiki/API%20Reference)
summary: Plugin for KeePass 2.x to mount TrueCrypt volumes
author: Patrick Schaller
